entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as helping himself to roast potatoes. He is not described in detail but is referred to by name.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is standing up and welcoming Professor Trelawney. He is described as having twinkling eyes.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is gliding towards the table in a green sequined dress, making her look like a glittering dragonfly. She claims to have been crystal gazing and was prompted by fate to join them.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is mentioned as the location where the scene takes place.

relationships.description: Dumbledore welcomes Professor Trelawney to join them.
Harry is helping himself to roast potatoes.
